attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament,due to failures by Ministers to abide fairly with expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We find it grossly offensive that Ministers and MP's are claiming for food.
Thousands of pensioners in this country find it very difficult to pay for heating and other utility bills,and food.So they go short on food.While the Pigs live off the fat of those they are there to help.
   Its a Joke,a farce gone wrong,claiming for croceries is disgusting when you earn £38.0000 as a back bencher,and like Evan Harris claim for his council Tax and food and his utility bills.
    You surely are taking the p--s out of us are you not. 
     Dissolve Parliament,and start all over again,with a new Charter of rights for all,not just a crowd of pigs at a trough.Which is what you make yourselfs look like.

rejection.details:
MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk

A petition calling for a general election already exists at http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
